cards.Name: Rhino - Motivational Speaker
cards.Flavor_Text: "Don't forget, you are awesome. You can handle anything. Now channel your inner awesomeness and CLEAR THIS TRAP!"
cards.Body_Text: Destiny Calling: Your other characters get +2 {w}.

cards.Name: Perdita - Playful Mother
cards.Body_Text:
Who's Next?: Whenever this character quests, you pay 2{i} less for the next Puppy character you play this turn.
Don't Be Afraid: Your Puppy characters gain Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)

cards.Name: King Stefan - New Father
cards.Flavor_Text: Every parent struggles with getting their baby to sleep. Kings are no different.

cards.Name: Bolt - Superdog
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Bolt.) Mark Of Power: Whenever you ready this character, gain 1 lore for each other undamaged character you have in play. 
Bolt Stare: {e} - Banish chosen Illusion character.

cards.Name: Roger Radcliff - Dog Lover
cards.Flavor_Text: The best part of completing the obstacle course was finding their human at the end.
cards.Body_Text: There You Go: Whenever this character quests, you may remove up to 1 damage from each of your Puppy characters.

cards.Name: Trusty - Loyal Bloodhound
cards.Flavor_Text: "As my grandpappy, Old Reliable, used to say, save your energy for when it matters."
cards.Body_Text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

cards.Name: Peg - Natural Performer
cards.Body_Text: Captive Audience: {e} - If you have 3 or more other characters in play, draw a card.

cards.Name: Suzy - Master Seamstress
cards.Flavor_Text: The devoted mice were excited to surprise Cinderella with a new dress. Smiling, Archazia gave them a spool of magic thread. "This will make it perfect," she said.

cards.Name: Mittens - Sassy Street Cat
cards.Body_Text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
NO THANKS NECESSARY: Once during your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, your other characters with Bodyguard get +1 {l} this turn.

cards.Name: Tramp - Street-Smart Dog
cards.Body_Text:
NOW IT'S A PARTY: For each character you have in play, you pay 1 {i} less to play this character.
HOW'S PICKINGS?: When you play this character, you may draw a card for each other character you have in play, then choose and discard that many cards.

cards.Name: The Troubadour - Musical Narrator
cards.Body_Text:
Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)
Singer 4 (This character counts as cost 4 to sing songs.)

cards.Name: Wendy Darling - Pirate Queen
cards.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
TELL NO TALES: Whenever one of your other characters is banished, you may remove all
damage from chosen character.

cards.Name: Mirabel Madrigal - Hopeful Dreamer
cards.Flavor_Text: My family's amazing, and I'm in my family, so....
cards.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
Singer 5 (This character counts as cost 5 to sing songs.)

cards.Name: Aurora - Waking Beauty
cards.Body_Text:
Singer 5 (This character counts as cost 5 to sing songs.)
SWEET DREAMS: Whenever you remove 1 or more damage from a character, ready this character. She can't quest or challenge for the rest of this turn.

cards.Name: Cinderella - The Right One
cards.Flavor_Text: But, you see, I have the other slipper.
cards.Body_Text: IF THE SLIPPER FITS: When you play this character, you may put an item card named The Glass Slipper from your discard on the bottom of your deck to gain 3 lore.

cards.Name: Mariano Guzman - Handsome Suitor
cards.Flavor_Text: The puzzles of the heart are trickier than anything Archazia could come up with.
cards.Body_Text:
I SEE YOU: While you have a character named
Dolores Madrigal in play, this character gets +1 {l}.

cards.Name: Candlehead - Dedicated Racer
cards.Body_Text: WINNING ISN'T EVERYTHING: When this character is banished, you may remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

cards.Name: Bolt - Dependable Friend
cards.Flavor_Text:
Super dog versus super log! This is AWESOME!"
-Rhino
cards.Body_Text:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's
{s} this turn.)

cards.Name: Pascal - Garden Chameleon
cards.Flavor_Text: Once Pascal got into Archazia's flowerbeds, there was no getting him out.
cards.Body_Text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

cards.Name: King Candy - Royal Racer
cards.Flavor_Text: Get off of my track!
cards.Body_Text: SWEET REVENGE: Whenever one of your other Racer characters is banished, each opponent chooses and banishes one of their characters.

cards.Name: Penny - Bolt's Person
cards.Body_Text: ENDURING LOYALTY: When you play this character, you may remove up to 2 damage from chosen character and they gain Resist +1 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

cards.Name: Fix-It Felix Jr. - Pint-Sized Hero
cards.Flavor_Text: A trap is just a puzzle that's not very friendly.
cards.Body_Text: LET'S GET TO WORK: Whenever you return a Racer character card from your discard to your hand, you may ready chosen Racer character. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

cards.Name: Thunderbolt - Wonder Dog
cards.Body_Text:
Puppy Shift 3: (You may pay 3 {i} to play this on top of one of your Puppy characters.)
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

cards.Name: The Prince - Vigilant Suitor
cards.Body_Text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

cards.Name: Isabella Madrigal - In the Moment
cards.Flavor_Text: I just made something unexpected. Something sharp, something new.
cards.Body_Text: I'M TIRED OF PERFECT: Whenever one of your characters sings a song, this character can't be challenged until the start of your next turn.

cards.Name: Calhoun - Courageous Rescuer
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Calhoun.)
BACK TO START POSITIONS!: Whenever this character challenges another character, you may return a Racer character card from your discard to your hand.

cards.Name: Wreck-It Ralph - Hero's Duty
cards.Flavor_Text: I got that medal in the bag.
cards.Body_Text: OUTFLANK: During your turn, whenever one of your other characters is banished, this character gets +1 {l} this turn.

cards.Name: Lady - Miss Park Avenue
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Lady.)
SOMETHING WONDERFUL: When you play this character, you may return up to 2 character cards with cost 2 or less each from your discard to your hand.

cards.Name: Pongo - Dear Old Dad
cards.Flavor_Text: Tricks and traps are nothing for plucky pups.
cards.Body_Text: FOUND YOU, YOU LITTLE RASCAL: At the start of your turn, look at the cards in your inkwell. You may play a Puppy character from there for free.

cards.Name: Kenai - Protective Brother
cards.Body_Text: HE NEEDS ME: At the end of your turn, if this character is exerted, you may ready another chosen character of yours and remove all damage from them.

cards.Name: Minnie Mouse - Storyteller
cards.Body_Text:
GATHER AROUND: Whenever you play a character, this character gets +1 {l} this turn.
JUST ONE MORE: Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character loses {s} equal to this character's {l} until the start of your next turn.

cards.Name: Perla - Nimble Seamstress
cards.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's
{s} this turn.)

cards.Franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
cards.Name: Snow White - Fairest in the Land
cards.Flavor_Text: A true heart can thwart many an evil scheme.
cards.Body_Text: HIDDEN AWAY: This character can't be challenged.

cards.Name: Koda - Smallish Bear
cards.Flavor_Text: And then they were like, 'How'd you catch so many fish, Koda?' And I said, Well, you know me. I know how to catch fish. And they said...

cards.Name: Mirabel Madrigal - Musically Talented
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 to play this on top of one of your characters named Mirabel Madrigal.)
HER OWN SPECIAL GIFT: Whenever this character quests, you may return a song card with cost 3 or less from your discard to your hand.

cards.Name: Calhoun - Battle-Tested
cards.Flavor_Text: Preparation and luck-you can only rely on one to win a fight!
cards.Body_Text: TACTICAL ADVANTAGE When you play this character, you may choose and discard a card to give chosen opposing character -3 {s} until the start of your next turn.

cards.Name: Pepa Madrigal - Sensitive Sister
cards.Flavor_Text:
Archazia's calming presence helped Pepa dispel
her dark mood.
cards.Body_Text: CLEAR SKIES, CLEAR SKIES: Whenever one or more of your characters sings a song, gain 1 lore.

cards.Name: So Much To Give
cards.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
Draw a card. Chosen character gains Bodyguard until the start of your next turn. (An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

cards.Classifications: Remove up to 3 damage from chosen character or location. Draw a card.
cards.Name: Restoring the Heart
cards.Flavor_Text: The moment her heart was returned, greenery burst to life and restored Te Fiti to her rightful form.

cards.Name: The Family Madrigal
cards.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 5 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may reveal up to 1 Madrigal character card and up to 1 song card and put them into your hand. Put the rest on the top of your deck in any order.

cards.Name: Amber Coil
cards.Flavor_Text: Martin smiled as the coil snapped into place and he felt a surge of healing energy.
cards.Body_Text: HEALING AURA: During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, you may remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

cards.Name: Spaghetti Dinner
cards.Flavor_Text:
Hey, Tony's! Of course. The very place for a very
special occasion."
-Tramp
cards.Body_Text: FINE DINING: {e},1 {i} - If you have 2 or more characters in play, gain 1 lore.

cards.Name: Kanine Krunchies
cards.Flavor_Text: Happy dogs are those who eat nutritious Kanine Krunchies!
cards.Body_Text: YOU CAN BE A CHAMPION, TOO: Your Puppy characters get +1 {w}

cards.Name: The Glass Slipper
cards.Body_Text:
PERFECT PAIR: You may only have 2 copies of The Glass Slipper in your deck.
SEARCH THE KINGDOM: Banish this item, {e} one of your Prince characters - Search your deck for a Princess character card and reveal it to all players. Put that card into your hand and shuffle your deck.

cards.Name: Tanana - Tribal Elder
cards.Flavor_Text: "This is a place of wonder and learning. Pay attention to the Owl and see what she can teach you."

cards.Name: Treasure Guardian - Foreboding Sentry
cards.Flavor_Text:
"At last, after all my years of searching!"
-Jafar
cards.Body_Text: UNTOLD TREASURE: When you play this character, if you have an Illusion character in play, you may draw a card.

cards.Name: Honeymaren - Northuldra Guide
cards.Flavor_Text: "It's said to be a bridge between us and the magic of nature."
cards.Body_Text: TALE OF THE FIFTH SPIRIT: When you play this character, if an opponent has an exerted character in play, gain 1 lore.

cards.Name: Iago - Giant Spectral Parrot
cards.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
Vanish (When an opponent chooses this character for an action, banish them.)

cards.Name: Chernabog - Creature of the Night
cards.Body_Text: MIDNIGHT REVEL: When you play this character, each  opponent chooses and exerts one of their ready characters. They can't ready at the start of their next turn.

cards.Name: Jafar - Newly Crowned
cards.Flavor_Text: "Now that the Hexwell Crown is finally mine, no force in Lorcana can stand against me!"
cards.Body_Text: THIS IS NOT DONE YET: During an opponent's turn, whenever one of your Illusion characters is banished, you may return that card to your hand.

cards.Name: Hades - Fast Talker
cards.Flavor_Text: "... You get a whole lotta gain."
cards.Body_Text: FOR JUST A LITTLE PAIN: When you play this character, you may deal 2 damage to another chosen character of yours to banish chosen character with cost 3 or less.

cards.Name: Madame Medusa - Diamond Lover
cards.Body_Text: SEARCH THE SWAMP Whenever this character quests, you may deal 2 damage to another chosen character of yours to put the top 3 cards of chosen player's deck into their discard.

cards.Name: Te Ka - Elemental Terror
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 7 (You may pay 7 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Te Ka.)
ANCIENT RAGE During your turn, whenever an opposing character is exerted, banish them.

cards.Name: Elsa - Trusted Sister
cards.Flavor_Text: "Fear is what can't be trusted."
cards.Body_Text: WHAT DO WE DO NOW? Whenever this character quests, if you have a character named Anna in play, gain 1 lore.

cards.Name: Madam Mim - Cheating Spellcaster
cards.Flavor_Text:
"She only wants rules so she can break them!"
-Archimedes
cards.Body_Text: PLAY ROUGH: Whenever this character quests, exert chosen opposing character.

cards.Name: Giant Cobra - Ghostly Serpent
cards.Body_Text:
Vanish (When an opponent chooses this character for an action, banish them.)
MYSTERIOUS ADVANTAGE: When you play this character, you may choose and discard a card to gain 2 lore.

cards.Name: Te Ka - Lava Monster
cards.Flavor_Text:
"You wanna get to Te Fiti, you have to go through a whole ocean of bad. Not to mention Te K?."
-Maui
cards.Body_Text: Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2 {s}.)

cards.Name: Yzma - Transformed Kitten
cards.Flavor_Text: "Yes, I've already finished this course. I'm still going to bounce a few more times."
cards.Body_Text: I WIN: When this character is banished, if you have more cards in your hand than each opponent, you may return this card to your hand.

cards.Name: Bucky - Nutty Rascal
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Oh, hang on. I love this bit! He pops the balloon and all those acorns go flying out. Gets me every time."
-Kronk
cards.Body_Text: POP!: When this character is banished in a challenge, you may draw a card.

cards.Name: Pain - Impudent Imp
cards.Flavor_Text: "Um, wasn't there something the boss wanted us to take care of? Was it testing these arrows?"

cards.Name: Rajah - Ghostly Tiger
cards.Flavor_Text: He may be spectral, but the danger is very real.
cards.Body_Text: Vanish (When an opponent chooses this character for an action, banish them.)

cards.Name: Kronk - Laid Back
cards.Body_Text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
I'M LOVIN' THIS: If an effect would cause you to discard one or more cards, you don't discard.

cards.Name: Mother Gothel - Vain Sorceress
cards.Body_Text: NOW YOU'VE UPSET ME: Whenever one of your characters challenges, you may move 1 damage counter from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

cards.Name: Sven - Keen-Eyed Reindeer
cards.Body_Text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
FORMIDABLE GLARE: When you play this character, chosen character gets -3 {s} this turn.

cards.Name: Diablo - Spiteful Raven
cards.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2 {s}.)

cards.Name: Merlin - Clever Clairvoyant
cards.Body_Text: PRESTIDIGITONIUM: Whenever this character quests, name a card, then reveal the top card of your deck. If it's the named card, put it into your inkwell facedown and exerted. Otherwise, put it on the top of your deck.

cards.Name: Yzma - Above It All
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 to play this on top of one of your characters named Yzma.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
BACK TO WORK: Whenever another character is banished in a challenge, return that card to its player's hand, then that player discards a card at random.

cards.Name: Elsa - Ice Maker
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 to play this on top of one of
your characters named Elsa.)
WINTER WALL: Whenever this character quests, you may exert chosen character. If you do and you have a character named Anna in play, the chosen character can't ready at the start of their next turn.

cards.Name: Kenai - Magical Bear
cards.Body_Text:
Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2 {s}.)
WISDOM OF HIS STORY During your turn, when this character is banished in a challenge, return this card to your hand and gain 1 lore.

cards.Name: Kuzco - Panicked Llama
cards.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
WE CAN FIGURE THIS OUT: At the start of your turn, choose one:
- Each player draws a card.
- Each player chooses and discards a card.

cards.Name: Anna - Ice Breaker
cards.Body_Text:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's
{s} this turn.)
WINTER AMBUSH: When you play this character, chosen opposing character can't ready at the start of their next turn.

cards.Name: Donald Duck - Flustered Sorcerer
cards.Flavor_Text: When it comes to magic spells, proper pronunciation is key.
cards.Body_Text: OBFUSCATE!: Opponents need 25 lore to win the game.

cards.Franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
cards.Name: The Queen - Jealous Beauty
cards.Body_Text: NO ORDINARY APPLE: {e} - Choose 3 cards from chosen opponent's discard and put them on the bottom of their deck to gain 3 lore. If any Princess cards were moved this way, gain 4 lore instead.

cards.Name: Panic - High-Strung Imp
cards.Flavor_Text: "What the boss doesn't know won't hurt us. Much. I hope."
cards.Body_Text: STARTLED SHRIEK: When you play this character, you may move up to 2 damage counters from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

cards.Name: Archimedes - Exceptional Owl
cards.Flavor_Text: Archazia's library was a treasure trove of knowledge even for such an educated owl.
cards.Body_Text: MORE TO LEARN: Whenever an opponent chooses this character for an action or ability, you may draw a card.

cards.Name: Kashekim - Ancient Ruler
cards.Flavor_Text: "You presume much, to think you are welcome here."

cards.Name: Dolores Madrigal - Within Earshot
cards.Flavor_Text: She heard Mariano's heart skip a beat. Was it because of the puzzle, or was he looking at her?
cards.Body_Text: I HEAR YOU: Whenever one of your characters sings a song, chosen opponent reveals their hand.

cards.Name: Mufasa - Among the Stars
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Mufasa.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)

cards.Name: Magical Maneuvers
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Oh, I'm sure it's fine if we move these traps around. Archazia won't mind a little magic."
-Flora
cards.Body_Text: Return chosen character of yours to your hand. Exert chosen character.

cards.Name: This Is My Family
cards.Flavor_Text: So many stars, and everybody gets to shine
cards.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
Gain 1 lore. Draw a card.

cards.Franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
cards.Name: Show Me More!
cards.Flavor_Text: "Weave of time, attend to me- Reveal the moments soon to be!"
cards.Body_Text: Each player draws 3 cards.

cards.Name: Restoring the Crown
cards.Flavor_Text: The Hexwell surged with pure creative energy, fusing the crown's pieces in a final burst of power.
cards.Body_Text: Exert all opposing characters. Whenever one of your characters banishes another character in a challenge this turn, gain 2 lore.

cards.Name: Amethyst Coil
cards.Flavor_Text: Shanzay's coil flared, sending a tendril of mystical energy toward the damaged glimmer.
cards.Body_Text: MAGICAL TOUCH: During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, you may move 1 damage counter from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

cards.Name: Drizella - Spoiled Stepsister
cards.Flavor_Text: Once again, Drizella was confronted with a simple truth: life wasn't fair.

cards.Name: Grewnge - Cannon Expert
cards.Flavor_Text: He loves two things: explosions and even more explosions.
cards.Body_Text: RAPID FIRE: Whenever this character quests, you pay 1 {i} less for the next action you play this turn.

cards.Name: Baymax - Low Battery
cards.Flavor_Text: "Processing data from Archazia's thought scrolls is taking a great deal of power. Extreme battery saver protocol engaged."
cards.Body_Text: SHHHHH: This character enters play exerted.

cards.Name: Thomas O'Malley - Feline Charmer
cards.Flavor_Text: There's nothing he can't talk his way out of.
cards.Body_Text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

cards.Name: Pete - Pirate Scoundrel
cards.Flavor_Text: "I wasn't stealin' it! I was just keepin' it safe."
cards.Body_Text: PILFER AND PLUNDER: Whenever you play an action that isn't a song, you may banish chosen item.

cards.Name: Hiro Hamada - Future Champion
cards.Flavor_Text: Even with a mind as brilliant as his, the mixed ink was a unique puzzle to solve.
cards.Body_Text: ORIGIN STORY: When you play a Floodborn character on this card, draw a card.

cards.Name: Cheshire Cat - Perplexing Feline
cards.Flavor_Text:
"He's not your average cat, after all. Then again, what cat is?"
-Archazia
cards.Body_Text: MAD GRIN: When you play this character, you may deal 2 damage to chosen damaged character.

cards.Name: Shere Khan - Infamous Tiger
cards.Flavor_Text: He'd be the first to tell you he's as magnificent as he is deadly.
cards.Body_Text: WHATA PITY: When you play this character, discard your hand.

cards.Name: Basil - Secret Informer
cards.Flavor_Text: "The final part of the crown! Jafar will be pleased."
cards.Body_Text: DRAW THEM OUT: Whenever this character quests, opposing damaged characters gain Reckless during their next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

cards.Name: Mad Hatter - Unruly Eccentric
cards.Flavor_Text: "Don't you care for tea?"
cards.Body_Text: UNBIRTHDAY PRESENT: Whenever a damaged character challenges another character, you may draw a card.

cards.Name: Queen of Hearts - Unpredictable Bully
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Queen of Hearts.)
IF I LOSE MY TEMPER...: Whenever another character is played, put a damage counter on them.

cards.Name: Hiro Hamada - Armor Designer
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Hiro Hamada.)
YOU CAN BE WAY MORE: Your Floodborn characters that have a card under them gain Evasive and Ward. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them. Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)

cards.Name: Yokai - Intellectual Schemer
cards.Flavor_Text: In the hands of a lesser person, this much power would be irresponsible.
cards.Body_Text: INNOVATE: You pay 1O less to play characters using their Shift ability.

cards.Name: Donald Duck - Lively Pirate
cards.Flavor_Text: "Aye aye, Captain! I'll get it done."
cards.Body_Text: DUCK OF ACTION: Whenever this character is challenged, you may return an action card that isn't a song card from your discard to your hand.

cards.Name: Berlioz - Mischievous Kitten
cards.Flavor_Text: "Look what I found! Can we stay here and play?"

cards.Name: Lady - Elegant Spaniel
cards.Flavor_Text: "Are you sure we're allowed in here? Jim Dear would never allow me in the kitchen."
cards.Body_Text: A DOG'S LIFE: While you have a character named Tramp in play, this character gets +1 {l}.

cards.Name: Yzma - Exasperated Schemer
cards.Flavor_Text: "One of these must be the right lever, but I'll be a llama's aunt if l can figure out which one ..."
cards.Body_Text: HOW SHALL I DO IT?: When you play this character, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

cards.Name: Pacha - Trekmate
cards.Flavor_Text: He liked to prepare for any emergency. They happened frequently with Kuzco around.
cards.Body_Text: FULL PACK: While you have more cards in your hand than each opponent, this character gets +2 {l}.

cards.Name: Tweekdle Dee & Tweedle Dum - Strange Storytellers
cards.Flavor_Text:
"You can't leave yet! Don't you want to hear the ending?"
-Tweedle Dee
cards.Body_Text: ANOTHER RECITATION: Whenever this character quests, you may return chosen damaged character to their player's hand.

cards.Name: Baymax - Giant Robot
cards.Body_Text:
Universal Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {i} to play this on top of any one of your characters.)
FUNCTIONALITY IMPROVED: When you play this character, if you used Shift to play him, remove all damage from him.

cards.Name: Gizmoduck - Suited Up
cards.Body_Text:
Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)
BLATHERING BLATHERSKITE This character can challenge ready damaged characters.

cards.Name: Fidget - Sneaky Bat
cards.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
I TOOK CARE OF EVERYTHING: Whenever this character quests, another chosen character of yours gains Evasive until the start of your next turn.

cards.Name: Mr. Smee - Efficient Captain
cards.Flavor_Text: "All right now, crew-we've a lot to do today!"
cards.Body_Text: PIPE UP THE CREW: Whenever you play an action that isn't a song, you may ready chosen Pirate character.

cards.Name: Daisy Duck - Multitalented Pirate
cards.Flavor_Text: A captain must be inventive, commanding, and unafraid of trampolines.
cards.Body_Text: FOWL PLAY: Once during your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, chosen opponent chooses one of their characters and returns that card to their hand.

cards.Name: John Silver - Vengeful Pirate
cards.Body_Text:
DRAWN TO A FIGHT If an opposing character was damaged this turn, you pay 2 {i} less to play this character.
Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)
TAIN'T GONE SOFT!: Whenever you play an action that isn't a song, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character.

cards.Name: Tramp - Enterprising Dog
cards.Body_Text:
HEY, PIDGE: If you have a character named Lady in play, you pay 1 {i} less to play this character.
NO TIME FOR WISECRACKS: When you play this character, chosen character of yours gets +1 {s} this turn for each other character you have in play.

cards.Name: King of Hearts - Picky Ruler
cards.Flavor_Text: "You there! You can't be here in the state you're in. Begone before the Queen sees this mess!"
cards.Body_Text: OBJECTIONABLE STATE: Damaged characters can't challenge your characters.

cards.Name: Duchess - Elegany Feline
cards.Flavor_Text: "Now darlings, pay close attention to where we are. What can you learn about the Owl from the house?"

cards.Name: Anastasia - Bossy Stepsister
cards.Flavor_Text: "Out of my way! I'm going to be the first to finish!"
cards.Body_Text: OH, I HATE THIS!: Whenever this character is challenged, the challenging player chooses and discards a card.

cards.Name: Pete - Space Pirate
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Pete.)
FRIGHTFUL SCHEME: While this character is exerted, opposing characters can't exert to sing songs and your Pirate characters gain Resist +1. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

cards.Name: Lady Tremaine - Bitterly Jealous
cards.Body_Text: THAT'S QUITE ENOUGH: {e} - Return chosen damaged character to their player's hand. Then, each opponent discards a card at random.

cards.Name: Wake Up, Alice!
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Alice! Will you kindly pay attention and recite your lesson?"
-Alice's sister
cards.Body_Text: Return chosen damaged character to their player's hand.

cards.Name: He's A Tramp
cards.Flavor_Text: Wish that I could travel his way
cards.Body_Text: (A character with cost 1 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.) Chosen character gets +1 {s} this turn for each character you have in play.

cards.Name: The Return of Hercules
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Congratulations, Wonderboy. You'll make one heck of a god."
-Megara
cards.Body_Text: Each player may reveal a character card from their hand and play it for free.

cards.Name: Ink Geyser
cards.Body_Text: Each player exerts all the cards in their inkwell. Then each player with more than 3 cards in their inkwell returns cards at random from their inkwell to their hand until they have 3 cards in their inkwell.

cards.Name: Emerald Coil
cards.Flavor_Text: The coil Martin wore lifted his spirits as well as his body.
cards.Body_Text: SHIMMERING WINGS: During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, chosen character gains Evasive until the start of your next turn. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

cards.Name: Grandmother Fa - Spirited Elder
cards.Flavor_Text: "Fear will get you hurt. Luck will get you through."
cards.Body_Text: I'VE GOT ALL THE LUCK WE'LL NEED: Whenever this character quests, you may give chosen character of yours +2 {s} this turn.

cards.Name: Queen of Hearts - Losing Her Temper
cards.Flavor_Text: Something told the Illumineers she'd had enough of the obstacles.
cards.Body_Text: ROYAL PAIN: While this character has damage, she gets +3 {s}.

cards.Name: The Matchmaker - Unforgiving Expert
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Who spit in her bean curd?"
-Grandma Fa
cards.Body_Text: YOU ARE A DISGRACE!: Whenever this character challenges another character, each opponent loses 1 lore.

cards.Name: Denahi - Impatient Hunter
cards.Flavor_Text: "There's no time. We have to act now!"
cards.Body_Text:
Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)
Resist +2 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 2.)

cards.Name: Stabbington Brother - Without a Patch
cards.Body_Text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
GET 'EM!: Your other characters named Stabbington Brother gain Rush.

cards.Name: Belle - Mechanic Extraordinaire
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 7
SALVAGE: For each item card in your discard, you pay 1 {i} less to play this character using her Shift ability.
REPURPOSE: Whenever this character quests, you may put up to 3 item cards from your discard on the bottom of your deck to gain 1 lore for each item card moved this way.

cards.Name: Cy-bug - Invasive Enemy
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Cy-Bugs are like a virus. They don't know they're in a game."
-Calhoun
cards.Body_Text: HIVE MIND: This character gets +1 {s} for each other character you have in play.

cards.Name: Stabbington Brother - With a Patch
cards.Flavor_Text: Silence is golden. And he loves gold.
cards.Body_Text: CRIME OF OPPORTUNITY: When you play this character, chosen opponent loses 1 lore.

cards.Name: Card Soldiers - Royal Troops
cards.Flavor_Text: The Three of Hearts raised his spear and whispered to himself, "While others fall, a Queen's soldier stands tall."
cards.Body_Text: TAKE POINT: While a damaged character is in play, this character gets +2 {s}.

cards.Name: Cogsworth - Climbing Clock
cards.Flavor_Text: "Top shelf? Pshaw! If it's a book the mademoiselle wants, I'll find a way to get it for her!"
cards.Body_Text: STILL USEFUL: While you have an item card in your discard, this character gets +2 {s}.

cards.Name: Toby - Dogged Companion
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Toby has the most splendid sense of smell of any hound I've trained. But he can be deucedly frisky."
-Basil

cards.Name: Beagle Boys - Small-Time Crooks
cards.Body_Text: HURRY IT UP!: Whenever this character quests, chosen character of yours gains Rush and Resist +1 this turn. (They can challenge the turn they're played. Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

cards.Name: Li Shang - Newly Promoted
cards.Body_Text:
I WON'T LET YOU DOWN: This character can challenge ready characters.
ENORMOUS RESPONSIBILITY: While this character has damage, he gets +2 {s}.

cards.Name: Moana - Island Explorer
cards.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
ADVENTUROUS SPIRIT: Whenever this character challenges another character, another chosen character of yours gets +3 {s} this turn.

cards.Name: The Phantom Blot - Shadowy Figure
cards.Flavor_Text: Nobody knows who or what he really is or what he's planning.
cards.Body_Text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

cards.Name: Beast - Frustrated Designer
cards.Flavor_Text:
"No, no, no! This is NOT THE WAY / SEE IT IN
MY HEAD!"
cards.Body_Text: I'VE HAD IT!: {e}, 2 {i}, Banish 2 of your items - Deal 5 damage to chosen character.

cards.Name: Mushu - Majestic Dragon
cards.Body_Text:
INTIMIDATING AND AWE-INSPIRING: Whenever one of your characters challenges, they gain Resist +2 during that challenge. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)
GUARDIAN OF LOST SOULS During your turn, whenever one of your characters banishes another character in a challenge, gain 2 lore.

cards.Name: Maurice - Unconventional Inventor
cards.Body_Text: HOW ON EARTH DID THAT HAPPEN?: When you play this character, you may banish chosen item of yours to draw a card. If the banished item is named Maurice's Machine, you may also banish chosen character with 2 {s} or less.

cards.Name: Goofy - Extreme Athlete
cards.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
STAR POWER Whenever this character challenges another character, your other characters get +1 {l} this turn.

cards.Name: Lyle Tiberius Rourke - Crystallized Mercenary
cards.Flavor_Text: He got what he wanted-just not the way he planned.
cards.Body_Text: EXPLOSIVE: Once during your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, deal 2 damage to each character in play.

cards.Name: Mulan - Imperial General
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Mulan.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
EXCEPTIONAL LEADER" Whenever this character challenges another character, your other characters gain "This character can challenge ready characters" this turn.

cards.Name: Baloo - Ol' Iron Paws
cards.Flavor_Text: "Now, move. That's it. Now give me a big bear growl. Scare me."
cards.Body_Text: FIGHT LIKE A BEAR: Your characters with 7 {s} or more can't be dealt damage.

cards.Name: Ratigan - Nefarious Criminal
cards.Flavor_Text: "Why stop the show when you can simply steal it?"
cards.Body_Text: A MARVELOUS PERFORMANCE: Whenever you play an action while this character is exerted, gain 1 lore.

cards.Name: Sir Kay, Unruly Knight
cards.Flavor_Text: "An owl in charge? Pshaw." He glared at the others. Then his eye fell on the targets set up nearby, and he brightened. "But as long as I still get to joust ..."

cards.Name: Milo Thatch - Undaunted Scholar
cards.Flavor_Text: "Okay, we rotated the globe to move the mural into position. We have the coordinates. Let's go!"
cards.Body_Text: I'M YOUR GUY: Whenever you play an action, you may give chosen character +2 {s} this turn.

cards.Name: Edgar Balthazar - Ambitious Butler
cards.Flavor_Text: "All these traps, all these locks, all these machines... If they think that's going to stop me, they've sorely underestimated Edgar Balthazar!"

cards.Name: We've Got Company!
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Well, as usual, diplomacy has failed us."
-Lyle Tiberius Rourke
cards.Body_Text: Ready all your characters. They gain Reckless this turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

cards.Name: Out of Order
cards.Flavor_Text: The last thing any gamer wants to see.
cards.Body_Text: Banish chosen character.

cards.Name: Ruby Coil
cards.Flavor_Text: Venturo felt a spark from his arm coil, and energy flooded his strained muscles.
cards.Body_Text: CRIMSON SPARK: During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, chosen character gets +2 {s} this turn.

cards.Name: Unconventional Tool
cards.Flavor_Text:
"I use this one a lot more than you'd think!"
-Maurice
cards.Body_Text: FIXED IN NO TIME: When this item is banished, you pay 2 {i} less for the next item you play this turn.

cards.Name: Maurice's Machine
cards.Flavor_Text:
"I hope it does what I built it to do!"
-Maurice
cards.Body_Text: BREAK DOWN: When this item is banished, you may return an item card with cost 2 or less from your discard to your hand.

cards.Name: Devil's Eye Diamond
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Just look at it, filled with power for its owner."
-Madame Medusa
cards.Body_Text: THE PRICE OF POWER: {e} - If one of your characters was damaged this turn, gain 1 lore.

cards.Name: Clarabelle - News Reporter
cards.Body_Text:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)
BREAKING STORY: Your other characters with Support get +1 {s}

cards.Name: Scrooge McDuck - Resourceful Miser
cards.Body_Text:
PUT IT TO GOOD USE: You may exert 4 items of yours to play this character for free.
FORTUNE HUNTER: When you play this character, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal an item card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

cards.Name: Mattias - Arendelle General
cards.Flavor_Text: "You must move quickly before the trap resets. Go!"
cards.Body_Text: PROUD TO SERVE: Your Queen characters gain Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)

cards.Name: Moana - Adventurer of Land and Sea
cards.Flavor_Text:
Moana receives a call from the ancestors to sail to new skies and reconnect people across the
entire ocean.

cards.Name: Monsieur D'Arque - Despicable Proprietor
cards.Flavor_Text: "I can help you with your problem... for the right price."
cards.Body_Text: I'VE COME TO COLLECT: Whenever this character quests, you may banish chosen item of yours to draw a card.

cards.Name: Gaetan Moliere - The Mole
cards.Flavor_Text: "Fascinating. This shouldn't exist, yet it does. It may be older than the Great Illuminary itself"

cards.Name: Belle - Apprentice Inventor
cards.Flavor_Text: Helping her dad keep the flying debris to a minimum.
cards.Body_Text: WHAT A MESS: During your turn, you may banish chosen item of yours to play this character for free.

cards.Name: Lucky - Runt of the Litter
cards.Body_Text: FOLLOW MY VOICE: Whenever this character quests, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. You may reveal any number of Puppy character cards and put them in your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

cards.Name: Dawson - Puzzling Sleuth
cards.Flavor_Text: "I say, what sort of contraption is this?"
cards.Body_Text: BE SENSIBLE: Once during your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, look at the top card of your deck. You may put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.

cards.Name: Tamatoa - Happy as a Clam
cards.Body_Text:
COOLEST COLLECTION: When you play this character, return up to 2 item cards from your discard to your hand.
I'M BEAUTIFUL, BABY!: Whenever this character quests, you may play an item for free.

cards.Name: HeiHei - Expanded Consciousness
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Heihei.)
Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)
CLEAR YOUR MIND: When you play this character, put all cards from your hand into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

cards.Name: Kida - Creative Thinker
cards.Body_Text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
KEY TO THE PUZZLE: {e} - Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one into your inkwell facedown and exerted and the other on the top of your deck.

cards.Name: Toulouse - Artistic Kitten
cards.Flavor_Text: He squeezed more paint from the tube and wiggled in delight. Archazia was fun, even if she was a giant owl. She had so many new colors to paint with!

cards.Name: Marie - Favored Kitten
cards.Flavor_Text: "Find yourself another Illumineer. This one's taken."
cards.Body_Text: I'LL SHOW YOU: Whenever this character quests, you may give chosen character -2 {s} this turn.

cards.Name: Pepper - Quick-Thinking Puppy
cards.Flavor_Text: Pepper proves every puppy is part of the pack.
cards.Body_Text: IN THE NICK OF TIME: Whenever one of your Puppy characters is banished, you may put that card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

cards.Name: Freckles - Good Boy
cards.Flavor_Text: "I want to play with the others! Can I, Dad? Please?"
cards.Body_Text: JUST SO CUTE!: When you play this character, chosen opposing character gets -1 {s} this turn.

cards.Name: Honey Lemon - Chemistry Whiz
cards.Body_Text: PRETTY GREAT, HUH?: Whenever you play a Floodborn character, if you used Shift to play them, you may remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

cards.Name: Robin Hood - Eye for Detail
cards.Flavor_Text:
"There's been a heap of legends and tall tales about Robin Hood. All different too."
-Alan-a-Dale
cards.Body_Text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

cards.Name: Penny the Orphan - Clever Child
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Penny, dear, now don't cry. We are here to help you."
-Miss Bianca
cards.Body_Text: OUR BOTTLE WORKED!: While you have a Hero character in play, this character gains Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)

cards.Name: Lady Click - Protective Confidant
cards.Body_Text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

cards.Name: Jasmine - Inspired Researcher
cards.Flavor_Text: "Oh, this is wonderful! I knew Archazia's thought scrolls would be worth a little extra effort!"
cards.Body_Text: EXTRA ASSISTANCE: Whenever this character quests, if you have no cards in your hand, draw a card for each Ally character you have in play.

cards.Name: Jebidiah Farnsworth - Expedition Cook
cards.Body_Text:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)
I GOT YOUR FOUR BASIC FOOD GROUPS: When you play this character, chosen character gains Resist +1 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

cards.Name: Baymax - Upgraded Robot
cards.Body_Text:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)
ADVANCED SCANNER: When you play this character, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Floodborn character card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

cards.Name: Maid Marian - Badminton Ace
cards.Body_Text:
GOOD SHOT: During an opponent's turn, whenever one of your Ally characters is damaged, deal 1 damage to chosen opposing character.
FAIR PLAY: Your characters named Lady Kluck gain Resist +1. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

cards.Name: Water Has Memory
cards.Body_Text: Look at the top 4 cards of chosen player's deck. Put one on the top of their deck and the rest on the bottom of their deck in any order.

cards.Name: All Is Found
cards.Flavor_Text: Where the north wind meets the sea There's a river full of memory
cards.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 5 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
Put up to 2 cards from your discard into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

cards.Name: Sapphire Coil
cards.Flavor_Text: A single flash of light from the coil on Venturo's leg could blind any foe.
cards.Body_Text: BRILLIANT SHINE: During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, you may give chosen character - 2 {s} this turn.

cards.Name: Baymax's Charging Station
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Battery at 100%. Ready for action!"
-Hiro
cards.Body_Text: ENERGY CONVERTER: Whenever you play a Floodborn character, if you used Shift to play them, you may draw a card.

cards.Name: Dr. Calico - Green-Eyed Man
cards.Flavor_Text: "Everything is positioning nicely."
cards.Body_Text: YOU'RE BEGINNING TO IRK ME: While this character has no damage, he gains Resist +2. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

cards.Name: Akela - Wolf Pack Elder
cards.Flavor_Text:
A wise leader does not shy away from difficult
decisions when the safety of the pack is at stake.

cards.Name: Helga Sinclair - Tough as Nails
cards.Body_Text:
Challenger +3 (While challenging, this character gets +3 {s}.)
QUICK REFLEXES: During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

cards.Name: Bolt - Headstrong Dog
cards.Flavor_Text: "Looks like we're gonna do this the hard way."
cards.Body_Text: THERE'S NO TURNING BACK: Whenever this character quests, if he has no damage, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

cards.Name: HeiHei - Rambling Rooster
cards.Flavor_Text:
Archazia: "Why is he wearing a coconut?"
Shanzay: "It's probably better not to ask."

cards.Name: Raya - Guidance Seeker
cards.Body_Text: A GREATER PURPOSE: During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, this character gains Resist +1 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

cards.Name: Tuk Tuk - Disarminaly Cute
cards.Body_Text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
Resist +2 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 2.)

cards.Name: Fa Zhou - War Hero
cards.Flavor_Text: "Every trap you disarm, every test you pass, honors us all. Well done."
cards.Body_Text: TRAINING EXERCISES: Whenever one of your characters challenges another character, if it's the second challenge this turn, gain 3 lore.

cards.Name: Razoul - Menacing Guard
cards.Flavor_Text: "Mere trinkets won't get you any closer to Jafar."
cards.Body_Text: MY ORDERS COME FROM JAFAR: When you play this character, if you have a character named Jafar in play, you may banish chosen item.

cards.Name: Jafar - Aspiring Ruler
cards.Flavor_Text: "At last, both halves of the crown belong to me!"
cards.Body_Text: THAT'S BETTER: When you play this character, chosen character gains Challenger +2 this turn. (They get +2 {s} while challenging.)

cards.Name: Tick-Tock - Relentless Crocodile
cards.Flavor_Text:
"I say, Captain, do you hear something?"
-Peter Pan
cards.Body_Text: LOOKING FOR LUNCH: During your turn, this character gains Evasive while a Pirate character is in play. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

cards.Name: Kakamora - Band of Pirates
cards.Flavor_Text:
"They're ... kinda cute."
-Moana
cards.Body_Text: SHOWBOATING: While you have another Pirate character in play, this character gains Challenger +3 {s}. (While challenging, this character gets +3 {s} .)

cards.Name: Mulan - Disguised Soldier
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Okay this is it, time to show 'em your man walk."
-Mushu
cards.Body_Text: WHERE DO I SIGN IN?: When you play this character, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

cards.Name: Orville - Albatross Air
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Doesn't he fly beautifully?"
-Miss Bianca
cards.Body_Text: WELCOME ABOARD, FOLKS: During your turn, while you have a character named Miss Bianca or Bernard in play, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

cards.Name: Miss Bianca - Unwavering Agent
cards.Flavor_Text: "We'll reach the top of this tower in no time if we work together, darling."
cards.Body_Text: HAVE A LITTLE FAITH: If you have an Ally character in play, you pay 2 {i} less to play this character.

cards.Name: Mufasa - Respected King
cards.Flavor_Text: "Do you see this pillar? Even after it has fallen, it still can serve a purpose."

cards.Name: Aladdin - Research Assistant
cards.Body_Text:
HELPING HAND: Whenever this character quests, you may play an Ally character with cost 3 or less for free.
PUT IN THE EFFORT While this character is exerted, your Ally characters get +1 {s}.

cards.Name: Bagheera - Guardian Jaguar
cards.Body_Text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
YOU'VE GOT TO BE BRAVE During an opponent's turn, when this character is banished, deal 2 damage to each opposing character.

cards.Name: Gantu - Experienced Enforcer
cards.Body_Text:
CLOSE ALL CHANNELS: When you play this character, characters can't exert to sing songs until the start of your next turn.
DON'T GET ANY IDEAS: Each player pays 2 {i} more to play actions or items. This doesn't  apply to singing songs.)

cards.Name: Mickey Mouse - Inspirational Warrior
cards.Flavor_Text: He leads the way with a steadfast heart.
cards.Body_Text: STIRRING SPIRIT: During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may play a character for free.

cards.Name: Restoring Atlantis
cards.Flavor_Text:
"In times of danger, the crystal will choose a host, one of royal blood, to protect itself and its people."
-King Kashekim Nedakh
cards.Body_Text: Your characters can't be challenged until the start of your next turn.

cards.Name: Double Trouble
cards.Flavor_Text:
"We've had enough of your shenanigans! Take that!"
-Merryweather
cards.Body_Text: Deal 1 damage each to up to 2 chosen characters.

cards.Name: Steel Coil
cards.Flavor_Text: As the coil clicked onto Shanzay's arm, she felt a strengthened sense of clarity.
cards.Body_Text: METALLIC FLOW: During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

cards.Name: Training Staff
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Do not sit idle while others quest for glory."
- Li Shang
cards.Body_Text: PRECISION STRIKE: {e},1 {i} - Chosen character gains Challenger +2 this turn. They get +2 {s} while challenging.)
